comment: I'm tired of the Google photos best shot and the constant suggestions when I view each picture. A message pops up on each picture, either saying, fix lighting, order photo, rotate screen, archive, etc. It's annoying. Also, I don't like the best shot feature. I'll edit my pictures if I want to. I don't need these constant annoying suggestions. Please fix this. Thank you.
scenarios: When viewing a picture, a message consistently appears suggesting actions such as fixing lighting, ordering a photo, rotating the screen, or archiving the image.
The "best shot" feature automatically suggests edits to pictures, which the user finds unnecessary and would prefer to edit pictures manually.
key sentence: The "best shot" feature automatically suggests edits to pictures, which the user finds unnecessary and would prefer to edit pictures manually.
